view.name: ## view
view.description:
> 组件类型：UniViewElement 

 基本视图容器
view.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| hover-class | string([string.ClassString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | "none" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 指定按下去的样式类。当 hover-class="none" 时，没有点击态效果 |
| hover-stop-propagation | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态(祖先节点：指根节点到该节点路径上的所有节点都是这个节点的祖先节点) |
| hover-start-time | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒 |
| hover-stay-time | number | 400 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒 |
view.children:
### 子组件 @children-tags
支持所有组件

scroll-view.name: ## scroll-view
scroll-view.description:
> 组件类型：UniScrollViewElement 

 可滚动视图容器
scroll-view.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| type | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 渲染模式，可取值 nested |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| nested | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 嵌套模式。用于处理父子 scroll-view 间的嵌套滚动，子节点只能是 nested-scroll-header nested-scroll-body 组件或自定义 refresher |
@| list | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 列表模式。只会渲染在屏节点，会根据直接子节点是否在屏来按需渲染，若只有一个直接子节点则性能会退化 |
@| custom | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 自定义模式。只会渲染在屏节点，子节点可以是 sticky-section list-view grid-view 等组件 |
| direction | string | "vertical" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动方向，可取值 none、all、horizontal、vertical，默认值vertical |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| none | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 禁止滚动 |
@| all | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","x","x","4.61"]]}' /> | 横向竖向都可滚动 app端不支持 |
@| horizontal | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 横向滚动 |
@| vertical | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 竖向滚动 |
| associative-container | string | "" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 关联的滚动容器 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| nested-scroll-view | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 嵌套滚动 |
| enable-back-to-top | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","4.11","x"]]}' /> | iOS点击顶部状态栏滚动条返回顶部，只支持竖向 |
| bounces | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果 优先级高于rebound |
| upper-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 距顶部/左边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| lower-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 距底部/右边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| scroll-top | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置竖向滚动条位置 |
| scroll-left | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置横向滚动条位置 |
| scroll-into-view | string([string.IDString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 值应为某子元素id（id不能以数字开头）。设置哪个方向可滚动，则在哪个方向滚动到该元素起始位置 |
| scroll-with-animation | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否在设置滚动条位置时使用滚动动画，设置false没有滚动动画 |
| refresher-enabled | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 开启下拉刷新，暂时不支持scroll-x = true横向刷新 |
| refresher-threshold | number | 45 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新阈值 |
| refresher-max-drag-distance | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉最大拖拽距离（单位px），默认是下拉刷新控件高度的2.5倍 |
| refresher-default-style | string | "black" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新默认样式，支持设置 black \| white \| none， none 表示不使用默认样式 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| black | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 深颜色雪花样式 |
@| white | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 浅白色雪花样式 |
@| none | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 不使用默认样式 |
| refresher-background | string([string.ColorString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | "transparent" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新区域背景颜色，默认透明 |
| refresher-triggered | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置当前下拉刷新状态，true 表示下拉刷新已经被触发，false 表示下拉刷新未被触发 |
| show-scrollbar | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否出现滚动条 |
| custom-nested-scroll | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素是否开启嵌套滚动 将滚动事件与父元素协商处理 |
| nested-scroll-child | string([string.IDString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | "" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.97","x","x"]]}' /> | 嵌套滚动子元素的id属性，不支持ref，scroll-view惯性滚动时会让对应id元素视图进行滚动，子元素滚动时会触发scroll-view的nestedprescroll事件，嵌套子元素需要设置custom-nested-scroll = true |
| @refresherpulling | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新控件被下拉 |
| @refresherrefresh | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被触发 |
| @refresherrestore | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被复位 |
| @refresherabort | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被中止 |
| @scrolltoupper | (event: [UniScrollToUpperEvent](#uniscrolltoupperevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动到顶部/左边，会触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| @scrolltolower | (event: [UniScrollToLowerEvent](#uniscrolltolowerevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动到底部/右边，会触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| @scroll | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |
| @scrollend | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动结束时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |
| @startnestedscroll | (event: [UniStartNestedScrollEvent](#unistartnestedscrollevent)) => Boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素开始滚动时触发, return true表示与子元素开启滚动协商 默认return false! event = {node} |
| @nestedprescroll | (event: [UniNestedPreScrollEvent](#uninestedprescrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素滚动时触发，可执行event.consumed(x,y)告知子元素deltaX、deltaY各消耗多少。子元素将执行差值后的deltaX、deltaY滚动距离。不执行consumed(x,y)则表示父元素不消耗deltaX、deltaY。event = {deltaX, deltaY} |
| @stopnestedscroll | (event: [UniStopNestedScrollEvent](#unistopnestedscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素滚动结束或意外终止时触发 |
| enable-passive | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| fast-deceleration | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| @dragstart | eventhandle | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| @dragging | eventhandle | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| @dragend | eventhandle | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| ~~rebound~~ | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果。已废弃，请改用bounces |
| ~~scroll-y~~ | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 允许纵向滚动，不支持同时设置scroll-x属性为true，同时设置true时scroll-y生效。已废弃，请改用direction |
| ~~scroll-x~~ | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 允许横向滚动，不支持同时设置scroll-y属性为true，同时设置true时scroll-y生效。已废弃，请改用direction |
scroll-view.event:
### 事件
#### UniRefresherEvent

```mermaid
graph LR
  
UniRefresherEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent
  style UniEvent color:#42b983
  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"
```
##### UniRefresherEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniRefresherEventDetail** | 是 | - | - | - |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| dy | number | 是 | - | - | - |


#### UniScrollToUpperEvent

```mermaid
graph LR
  
UniScrollToUpperEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent
  style UniEvent color:#42b983
  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"
```
##### UniScrollToUpperEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollToUpperEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| direction | string | 是 | - | - | 滚动方向 top 或 left |


#### UniScrollToLowerEvent

```mermaid
graph LR
  
UniScrollToLowerEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent
  style UniEvent color:#42b983
  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"
```
##### UniScrollToLowerEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollToLowerEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| direction | string | 是 | - | - | 滚动方向 bottom 或 right |


#### UniScrollEvent

```mermaid
graph LR
  
UniScrollEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent
  style UniEvent color:#42b983
  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"
```
##### UniScrollEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| scrollTop | number | 是 | - | - | 竖向滚动的距离 |
@| scrollLeft | number | 是 | - | - | 横向滚动的距离 |
@| scrollHeight | number | 是 | - | - | 滚动区域的高度 |
@| scrollWidth | number | 是 | - | - | 滚动区域的宽度 |
@| deltaY | number | 是 | - | - | 当次滚动事件竖向滚动量 |

| acceleration | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","x","x","x","-"]]}' /> | 当开启时，会根据滑动速度，连续滑动多屏 |
| disable-programmatic-animation | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","x","x","x","-"]]}' /> | 是否禁用代码变动触发 swiper 切换时使用动画。 |
| disable-touch | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否禁止用户 touch 操作 |

| easing-function | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> | 指定 swiper 切换缓动动画类型，有效值：default、linear、easeInCubic、easeOutCubic、easeInOutCubic |

@| :- |  :-: | :- |

@| linear | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> |  |
@| easeInCubic | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> |  |
@| easeOutCubic | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> |  |
@| easeInOutCubic | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> |  |
| autoplay | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否自动切换 |
| current | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 当前所在滑块的 index |
| current-item-id | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 当前所在滑块的 item-id ，不能与 current 被同时指定 |
| interval | number | 3000 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 自动切换时间间隔 |
| duration | number | 500 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","4.44","x","4.61"]]}' /> | 滑动动画时长（Android平台仅autoplay模式下生效） |
| circular | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否采用衔接滑动 |
| vertical | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滑动方向是否为纵向 |
| rebound | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果 |
| previous-margin | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","4.61"]]}' /> | 前边距，可用于露出前一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值 |
| next-margin | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","4.61"]]}' /> | 后边距，可用于露出后一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值 |
| display-multiple-items | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","x","x","-"]]}' /> | 同时显示的滑块数量 |
| @change | (event: [UniSwiperChangeEvent](#uniswiperchangeevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | current 改变时会触发 change 事件，event.detail = {current: current, source: source} |
| @transition | (event: [UniSwiperTransitionEvent](#uniswipertransitionevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | swiper-item 的位置发生改变时会触发 transition 事件，event.detail = {dx: dx, dy: dy} |
| @animationfinish | (event: [UniSwiperAnimationFinishEvent](#uniswiperanimationfinishevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 动画结束时会触发 animationfinish 事件，event.detail = {current: current, source: source} |

movable-view.name: ## movable-view
movable-view.description: 可移动的视图容器，在页面中可以拖拽滑动
movable-view.compatibility: ### 兼容性 | Web | 微信小程序 | Android | iOS | HarmonyOS | | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | | 4.0 | 4.41 | x | x | x |
movable-view.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| direction | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | movable-view的移动方向，属性值有all、vertical、horizontal、none |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| all | - |  |
@| vertical | - |  |
@| horizontal | - |  |
@| none | - |  |
| inertia | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | movable-view 是否带有惯性。 |
| out-of-bounds | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 超过可移动区域后，movable-view 是否还可以移动。 |
| x | string \\| number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 定义 x 轴方向的偏移，如果 x 的值不在可移动范围内，会自动移动到可移动范围；改变 x 的值会触发动画。 |
| y | string \\| number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 定义 y 轴方向的偏移，如果 y 的值不在可移动范围内，会自动移动到可移动范围；改变 y 的值会触发动画。 |
| damping | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 阻尼系数，用于控制 x 或 y 改变时的动画和过界回弹的动画，值越大移动越快。 |
| friction | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 摩擦系数，用于控制惯性滑动的动画，值越大摩擦力越大，滑动越快停止；必须大于0，否则会被设置成默认值 2。 |
| disabled | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 是否禁用。 |
| scale | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 是否支持双指缩放，默认缩放手势生效区域是在 movable-view 内。 |
| scale-min | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 定义缩放倍数最小值，默认为 0.5。 |
| scale-max | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 定义缩放倍数最大值，默认为 10。 |
| scale-value | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 定义缩放倍数，取值范围为 0.5 - 10 |
| animation | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 是否使用动画，默认为 true。 |
| @change | (event: [UniEvent](/component/common.md#unievent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 拖动过程中触发的事件，event.detail = {x: x, y: y, source: source}。其中source表示产生移动的原因，值可为touch（拖动）、touch-out-of-bounds（超出移动范围）、out-of-bounds（超出移动范围后的回弹）、friction（惯性）和空字符串（setData）。 |
| @scale | (event: [UniEvent](/component/common.md#unievent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 缩放过程中触发的事件，event.detail = {x: x, y: y, scale: scale}。 |
| htouchmove | eventhandle | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","-","-","-"]]}' /> | - |
| vtouchmove | eventhandle | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","-","-","-"]]}' /> | - |

cover-image.description: 覆盖在原生组件之上的图片视图，可覆盖的原生组件同cover-view，支持嵌套在cover-view里。
cover-image.attribute:
### 属性 | 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 | | :- | :- | :- | :-: | :- | | src | string([string.ImageURIString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | | 图标路径，支持临时路径、网络地址（1.6.0起支持）。暂不支持base64格式。 | | referrer-policy | string | - | | *(string)*
格式固定为 `https://servicewechat.com/{appid}/{version}/page-frame.html`，其中 {appid} 为小程序的 appid，{version} 为小程序的版本号，版本号为 0 表示为开发版、体验版以及审核版本，版本号为 devtools 表示为开发者工具，其余为正式版本； | @| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 | @| :- | :-: | :- | @| origin | | | @| no-referrer | | | | @load | eventhandle | - | | - | | @error | eventhandle | - | | - |

 列表组件
list-view.compatibility: ### 兼容性 | Web | 微信小程序 | Android | iOS | HarmonyOS | | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | | 4.02 | x | 3.9 | 4.11 | 4.61 |
list-view.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| direction | string | "vertical" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动方向，可取值 none、horizontal、vertical，默认值vertical。注：iOS 平台仅支持vertical |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| none | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 禁止滚动 |
@| horizontal | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","-","4.0","x","x"]]}' /> | 横向滚动 |
@| vertical | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","-","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 竖向滚动 |
| associative-container | string | "" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 关联的滚动容器 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| nested-scroll-view | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","-","4.11","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 嵌套滚动 |
| bounces | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.0","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果 优先级高于rebound |
| upper-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 距顶部/左边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| lower-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 距底部/右边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| scroll-top | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置竖向滚动条位置 |
| scroll-left | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","x"]]}' /> | 设置横向滚动条位置 |
| show-scrollbar | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否出现滚动条 |
| scroll-into-view | string([string.IDString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 值应为某子元素id（id不能以数字开头）。设置哪个方向可滚动，则在哪个方向滚动到该元素起始位置 |
| scroll-with-animation | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否在设置滚动条位置时使用滚动动画，设置false没有滚动动画 |
| refresher-enabled | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 开启下拉刷新，暂时不支持scroll-x = true横向刷新 |
| refresher-threshold | number | 45 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新阈值, 仅 refresher-default-style = 'none' 自定义样式下生效 |
| refresher-max-drag-distance | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉最大拖拽距离（单位px），默认是下拉刷新控件高度的2.5倍 |
| refresher-default-style | string | "black" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新默认样式，支持设置 black \| white \| none， none 表示不使用默认样式 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| black | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","-","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 深颜色雪花样式 |
@| white | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","-","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 浅白色雪花样式 |
@| none | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","-","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 不使用默认样式 |
| refresher-background | string([string.ColorString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | "transparent" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新区域背景颜色，默认透明 |
| refresher-triggered | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 设置当前下拉刷新状态，true 表示下拉刷新已经被触发，false 表示下拉刷新未被触发 |
| enable-back-to-top | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","4.11","x"]]}' /> | iOS点击顶部状态栏滚动条返回顶部，只支持竖向 |
| custom-nested-scroll | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素是否开启嵌套滚动 将滚动事件与父元素协商处理 |
| @refresherpulling | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新控件被下拉 |
| @refresherrefresh | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被触发 |
| @refresherrestore | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被复位 |
| @refresherabort | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.11","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被中止 |
| @scrolltoupper | (event: [UniScrollToUpperEvent](#uniscrolltoupperevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动到顶部/左边，会触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| @scrolltolower | (event: [UniScrollToLowerEvent](#uniscrolltolowerevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动到底部/右边，会触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| @scroll | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.02","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |
| @scrollend | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 滚动结束时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |
| padding | Array | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","x","x"]]}' /> | - |
| ~~rebound~~ | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果。已废弃，请改用bounces |
| ~~scroll-y~~ | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","4.11","x"]]}' /> | 允许纵向滚动，不支持同时设置scroll-x属性为true，同时设置true时scroll-y生效。已废弃，请改用direction |
| ~~scroll-x~~ | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","3.9","x","x"]]}' /> | 允许横向滚动，不支持同时设置scroll-y属性为true，同时设置true时scroll-y生效。已废弃，请改用direction |

### 事件

```mermaid
graph LR

@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |

@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |

graph LR

@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |

graph LR

@| nested-scroll-view | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 嵌套滚动 |
| bounces | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 控制是否回弹效果 |
| upper-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 距顶部/左边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| lower-threshold | number | 50 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 距底部/右边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| scroll-top | number | 0 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置竖向滚动条位置 |
| show-scrollbar | boolean | true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 控制是否出现滚动条 |
| scroll-into-view | string([string.IDString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 值应为某子元素id（id不能以数字开头）。设置哪个方向可滚动，则在哪个方向滚动到该元素起始位置 |
| scroll-with-animation | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 是否在设置滚动条位置时使用滚动动画，设置false没有滚动动画 |
| refresher-enabled | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 开启下拉刷新，暂时不支持scroll-x = true横向刷新 |
| refresher-threshold | number | 45 | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新阈值, 仅 refresher-default-style = 'none' 自定义样式下生效 |
| refresher-max-drag-distance | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置下拉最大拖拽距离（单位px），默认是下拉刷新控件高度的2.5倍 |
| refresher-default-style | string | "black" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新默认样式，支持设置 black \| white \| none， none 表示不使用默认样式 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| black | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 深颜色雪花样式 |
@| white | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 浅白色雪花样式 |
@| none | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 不使用默认样式 |
| refresher-background | string([string.ColorString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | "transparent" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置下拉刷新区域背景颜色，默认透明 |
| refresher-triggered | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 设置当前下拉刷新状态，true 表示下拉刷新已经被触发，false 表示下拉刷新未被触发 |
| enable-back-to-top | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","x","4.41","x"]]}' /> | iOS点击顶部状态栏滚动条返回顶部，只支持竖向 |
| custom-nested-scroll | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","x","x"]]}' /> | 子元素是否开启嵌套滚动 将滚动事件与父元素协商处理 |
| @refresherpulling | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新控件被下拉 |
| @refresherrefresh | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被触发 |
| @refresherrestore | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被复位 |
| @refresherabort | (event: [UniRefresherEvent](#unirefresherevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 下拉刷新被中止 |
| @scrolltoupper | (event: [UniScrollToUpperEvent](#uniscrolltoupperevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 滚动到顶部/左边，会触发 scrolltoupper 事件 |
| @scrolltolower | (event: [UniScrollToLowerEvent](#uniscrolltolowerevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 滚动到底部/右边，会触发 scrolltolower 事件 |
| @scroll | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |
| @scrollend | (event: [UniScrollEvent](#uniscrollevent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["x","x","4.41","4.41","x"]]}' /> | 滚动结束时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY} |

### 事件
#### UniRefresherEvent

graph LR
  
UniRefresherEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent

  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"

##### UniRefresherEvent 的属性值

@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |

| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollToUpperEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |

```
##### UniScrollToLowerEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollToLowerEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |

#### UniScrollEvent

```mermaid
graph LR
  
UniScrollEvent -- Extends --> UniEvent
  style UniEvent color:#42b983
  click UniEvent "https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/common.html#unievent"
```
##### UniScrollEvent 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| detail | **UniScrollEventDetail** | 是 | - | - |  |

@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| scrollTop | number | 是 | - | - | 竖向滚动的距离 |

@| scrollWidth | number | 是 | - | - | 滚动区域的宽度 |

nested-scroll-header.name: ## nested-scroll-header
nested-scroll-header.description:
> 组件类型：UniNestedScrollHeaderElement 

 scroll-view 嵌套模式场景中属于外层 scroll-view 的节点，仅支持作为 \<scroll-view type='nested'> 嵌套模式的直接子节点。不支持复数子节点，渲染时会取其第一个子节点来渲染
nested-scroll-header.compatibility: ### 兼容性 | Web | 微信小程序 | Android | iOS | HarmonyOS | | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | | x | x | 4.11 | 4.11 | 4.61 |
